attributes.action: Threaten to immediately review the Licence Fee if they close down specialist radio stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Asian Network and 6Music represent an important part of the BBC remit. If the licence fee is not going to be used to produce content that is not commercially viable in the independent sector then the public shouldn't be obliged to pay for a licence just so that they can own a Television.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent from government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
